post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Hi ,
Trust all is well with you. If these roles are not for you, I was hoping to network with you to see if there is anyone you might know. Please see the details below on the roles that I am currently pursuing for my clients:
Python/Django - Two to Three Month Contract - Toronto - (Skills) - Strong python developer with experience in Django, MySQL, JSP and HTML/CSS.
Database Administrator - Full time - Toronto - (Skills) - Extensive experience with Sybase and MySQL on a Linux (preferably Debian) environment. Knowledge of Apache and Tomcat. 6+ years Database Administrator experience supporting a large 24/7 production (data centre) environment.
Regards, Ed Rix Resource Planning Watercrest "Bridging People with Technology" (888) 244-7550 ext.110 ed@watercrest.net
post.title: Database Administrator/ Python/Django
